title: Mathematics Curriculum Preparation Strategies Through Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary education curriculum and foundational mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to design mathematics curricula integrated with science subjects and implementing collaborative learning activities in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Create two or more lesson plans linked to general education mathematics curricula using a collaborative instructional design framework.
Develop teaching materials to address math learning gaps for students with special education needs by applying pre-teaching strategies.
Conduct math class simulations applying reform-based instruction and participate in peer evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
